summary: This FBI 302 form documents a telephone call regarding prior litigation against Jeffrey Epstein. The subject was deposed in a lawsuit against Epstein over a decade ago, which settled. The subject's files have been destroyed, but efforts are being made to obtain a copy of the deposition transcript.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the telephone call was deposed in connection with a lawsuit against Jeffrey Epstein that occurred more than a decade ago and ultimately settled.

events.title: Prior Lawsuit and Deposition Against Epstein
events.description: A lawsuit was filed against Jeffrey Epstein more than a decade ago. The subject of this FBI call was deposed in connection with that lawsuit, which ultimately settled.

events.title: FBI Telephone Call Regarding Epstein Deposition
events.description: An FBI agent conducted a telephone call to discuss a prior deposition given in a lawsuit against Jeffrey Epstein. The subject's files were destroyed, but they are attempting to obtain a copy of the transcript.

keyFacts: A prior lawsuit was filed against Jeffrey Epstein more than a decade ago, which resulted in a settlement.
The subject of this FBI call was deposed in connection with that lawsuit.
The subject's legal files, including those of co-counsel, have been destroyed.
Efforts are underway to obtain a copy of the deposition transcript, potentially from a reporting agency.
The subject is willing to provide the deposition transcript to the FBI if they can obtain a copy.
